name: R4B-Account-R5-Account
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Account into FHIR R5

element.display: Tracks balance, charges, for patient or cost center

target.display: Tracks balance, charges, for patient or cost center
target.comment: R4B `Account` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account`
R4B `Account.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.contained`

element.display: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account

target.display: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account
target.comment: R4B `Account.coverage` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.coverage`

element.display: The party(s), such as insurances, that may contribute to the payment of this account

target.display: The party(s), such as insurances, that may contribute to the payment of this account
target.comment: R4B `Account.coverage.coverage` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.coverage.coverage`
R4B `Account.coverage.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.coverage.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Account.coverage.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.coverage.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Account.coverage.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.coverage.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The priority of the coverage in the context of this account

target.display: The priority of the coverage in the context of this account
target.comment: R4B `Account.coverage.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.coverage.priority`

R4B `Account.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Account.description` - description has change due to type change: R4B description string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 description
R4B `Account.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: The parties ultimately responsible for balancing the Account

target.display: The parties ultimately responsible for balancing the Account
target.comment: R4B `Account.guarantor` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.guarantor`
R4B `Account.guarantor.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.guarantor.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Account.guarantor.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.guarantor.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Account.guarantor.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.guarantor.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Account.guarantor.onHold` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.guarantor.onHold`
R4B `Account.guarantor.party` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.guarantor.party`
R4B `Account.guarantor.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.guarantor.period`
R4B `Account.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.id`
R4B `Account.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Account.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.implicitRules`
R4B `Account.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Account.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.meta`

R4B `Account.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Account.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Account.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.name`
R4B `Account.owner` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.owner`
R4B `Account.servicePeriod` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.servicePeriod`

R4B `Account.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/account-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/account-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: The entity that caused the expenses

target.display: The entity that caused the expenses
target.comment: R4B `Account.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Account.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.text`
R4B `Account.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Account.type`
